attributes.action: Reform food labelling in light of Bernard Matthews & Avian Flu
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We request that food labeling be reformed in 3 areas
1) Origin - package should state country of production as well as processing
2) Meat cut - package should state prime sub-prime or mechanically recovered
3) Welfare standards - clear defined meanings only, such things as 'farm fresh' to be banned propsed categories factory, intensive, free range, organic
